p: One of the ways to decrease the variability of bioactive compounds is to extract or purify them. Recent reviews have reported the use of compressed fluids, mainly under sub- and supercritical conditions, for the extraction of bioactive components from natural matrices [ 110, 111]. However, the extraction or purification of the compounds generates biopolymer materials and bioactive compounds with low variability and higher costs compared to their natural sources [ 77, 111].
